title: L.E.D Showcase Edition
desc: We are excited to announce our Next big event....... L.E.D Showcase Edition Date: Saturday 19th March 2016 Time: 6pm-10pm Venue: The Crypt on the Green St James Clerkenwell Clerkenwell Close London EC1R 0EA Fashion & Networking Event: * 20 Limited Front Row Tickets available, gold wristband, Champagne Reception + Free Bar access (priority Pass) includes; Champagne, Fashion cocktails, Sushi, Canapes + V.I.P Sponsored Goodie bags, +Afterparty * 2nd Row L.E.D Ticket includes: Champagne Reception + Free Bar access; Champagne, Fashion cocktails, Sushi, Canapes + Sponsored Goodie bags Standard L.E.D Ticket, Free Bar access; Champagne, Fashion cocktails, (1st come/ 1st serve) Sushi, Canapes + Goodie bags LIVE Magic/ Dance/Singing Performances/ DJ LIVE FASHION AUCTION: where designers will select their favorite outfit, which will be put in a LIVE Auction infront of our Audiance, starting bid ?100 and closing bid ?2,000. We truly hope you can join us for spectacular High Fashion Event with UK & International Emerging Designers.
